title: Delete a Service Level Agreement record
content:
You can delete a Service Level Agreement record but you should make sure that it's not related to other Service Level Management records that are actively tracking related metrics.

  1. From the main menu, select Plan > Service Level.

  2. Select the required type of agreement:

    • Service Agreements
    • Support and Case Agreements
    • Human Resource Agreements

  3. Select the Service Level Agreement record that you want to delete.

    To filter the record list, click the Add filter button. For more information, see Filters.

  4. Click Delete on the toolbar. Service Management displays a confirmation message.

  5. Click OK to confirm.
